value.description:
Also known as the Electronic Numerical Integrator And Computer, it is a massive early electronic computer used for complex calculations. Consumes enormous amounts of power.

Increases research speed when placed near hi-tech research bench and unlocks new research projects from reading the Disk. Each hi-tech research bench can connect up to 4 ENIACs.

Improves the success chance of archite injections by +2, reduces the duration of the injection coma by 2 days and decreases the rejection chance of the injection procedure by 10 when linked to an archogen injector
